title: Design System & Styling
description:
Create cohesive design system with TailwindCSS.

## Requirements
- Modern, polished look
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Touch-friendly tap targets
- Readable text sizes
- Good accessibility (contrast, etc.)
- AI chat should be prominent/easy to access

## Design Freedom
Complete freedom for:
- Color scheme
- Typography
- Layout and spacing
- Component design
- Navigation pattern
- Animation and transitions
acceptance_criteria:
## Acceptance Criteria

- [x] TailwindCSS configuration complete - VERIFIED: @theme directive with design tokens in src/index.css
- [x] Color palette defined - VERIFIED: Primary (blue), Accent (amber), Success, Warning, Error with full scales
- [x] Typography scale defined - VERIFIED: Inter font with system fallbacks
- [x] Button styles consistent - VERIFIED: .btn variants (primary, accent, secondary, ghost, sizes)
- [x] Form input styles consistent - VERIFIED: .input, .input-lg, .input-error, .label, .helper-text
- [x] Card/container styles defined - VERIFIED: .card, .card-elevated, .card-interactive, header/body/footer
- [x] Mobile-first responsive breakpoints - VERIFIED: 640/768/1024/1280px with container class
- [x] Touch-friendly tap targets (min 44px) - VERIFIED: --tap-target: 44px with @media (pointer: coarse)
- [x] Accessible color contrast - VERIFIED: OKLCH colors designed for WCAG AA, focus-visible states
- [x] Navigation pattern implemented - VERIFIED: .nav-bottom with .nav-item-chat prominence
notes:
## Implementation Summary

### What was done
- Created comprehensive design system in src/index.css using TailwindCSS v4 @theme directive
- Defined semantic color palette: Primary (Deep Blue), Accent (Warm Amber), Success, Warning, Error
- Used OKLCH color space for perceptual uniformity
- Touch-friendly: 44px minimum, 48px comfortable, 56px primary actions
- Mobile-first with bottom sheet modals, bottom nav, safe area insets
- Component classes for buttons, inputs, cards, banners, chat UI, modals
- Accessibility: focus-visible, skip links, sr-only, minimum tap targets
- Inter font via Google Fonts, added to index.html

### Key design decisions
- Primary blue for trust/education, amber accent for AI prominence
- Bottom navigation with prominent center chat button on mobile
- Bottom sheet pattern for modals on small screens
- OKLCH for better color interpolation

### Files modified
- src/index.css (design system tokens and component styles)
- index.html (Inter font, viewport-fit, theme-color meta)
